title: Are you gonna turn Sonic's hog-walking character into another sex in a new movie?
subtitle: Sonic may have looked at humans in trailers to see a film coming in 2019, but it does not expect the video game-based film to focus much on gender identity issues.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The character of the video game Sonic Hodgard will be different in a new film in 2019.
